title: Auto scrolling when on facebook.
content: I've been using firefox desktop pretty much since its inception. Despite numerous updates, for well over a year it has been auto scrolling when on facebook and I have tried every fix it to no avail (I'm highly computer literate and to me, this is now nuts). Note. My android mobile has never done it. I am at the end of my tether and am now looking at moving to another browser due to the frustration. I've gone through all the forums and note there are hundreds (if not thousands) of people with the same problem. Why can you not fix this and is there a fix? I don't want to, but I will move to another browser if I cannot get a satisfactory answer. Regards, Paul Mack. quegeemedia@gmail.com
creator: quegeemedia

title: Custom link colors
content: When I set custom colors to distinguish visited and unvisited links, it also overrides other colors. For example, when I use WORDLE, its color coding is not used and all I get is black and white letters so no feedback. The wording on the color override implies that it only applies to links. If it does not apply only to links, it is not a real option.
creator: moserlarry
